locations.name: Chicago O'Hare International Airport
locations.description: one of the world's busiest airports serves as a major hub for commercial aviation with hundreds of daily flights.

locations.name: Seattle-Tacoma International Airport
locations.description: the primary airport serving the Pacific Northwest, known for its role in Boeing aircraft operations.

locations.name: Lake Union Seaplane Base
locations.description: a picturesque seaplane base in downtown Seattle where floatplanes connect the city to remote destinations.

locations.name: Edwards Air Force Base
locations.description: a legendary test facility where experimental aircraft push the boundaries of flight, including supersonic research.

locations.name: EAA AirVenture Oshkosh
locations.description: the world's greatest aviation celebration where vintage aircraft and experimental planes gather annually.

locations.name: Remote Alaskan Airstrip
locations.description: a remote gravel strip in the Alaskan wilderness where bush pilots connect isolated communities.

locations.name: Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University
locations.description: a premier aviation university where the next generation of pilots learn to fly in modern training aircraft.

locations.name: MedStar Emergency Heliport
locations.description: a busy medical helicopter base where rotorcraft save lives through rapid emergency transport.

locations.name: London Heathrow Airport
locations.description: one of Europe's busiest airports and a major international gateway with diverse aircraft operations.

locations.name: Imperial War Museum Duxford
locations.description: a historic airfield preserving aviation heritage with operational WWII aircraft and classic warbirds.

locations.name: Ted Stevens Anchorage International Airport
locations.description: a crucial cargo hub where massive freighter aircraft connect Asia and North America.

locations.name: Wilderness Float Plane Base - Ontario
locations.description: a remote float plane base serving fishing lodges and wilderness camps across pristine Canadian lakes.
